name: Bello Playtest
description:
Expectations

This game has been in development for 3 weeks by our Team of 6, with in engine work starting just over a week ago. In this playtest we are exclusively testing our basic movement system, looking to see if it feels good to move and jump around. After you’re finished playing please check the Read Me doc for a link to our playtest form. Thank you and enjoy.

At any point you can bring up a control scheme by pressing Start on your controller or Esc on your keyboard.

Instructions;

Make your way to the top of Mount Fungus and grab the X.

BEST PLAYED WITH AN XBOX CONTROLLER
